title.en: The Male Leads Trapped in My House

description.en:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

title.en: Shachiku Kensei, Haishinsha ni naru - Black Guild Kaishain, Ukkari Kaishayou Kaisen de S-kyuu Monster wo Aite ni Musou suru Tokoro wo Zenkoku Haishin shite shimau

altTitles.ja: 社畜剣聖、配信者になる 〜ブラックギルド会社員、うっかり会社用回線でS級モンスターを相手に無双するところを全国配信してしまう〜

altTitles.en: The Corporate Slave Sword Master Becomes a Broadcaster
Workaholic Master Swordsman Becomes a Distributor
Black Guild Company Employee Carelessly Broadcasts a Video of Him Fighting an S-class Monster on a Company Line Nationwide ~Corporate S*ave Sword Saint Becomes a Broadcaster~

description.en:
“Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. 

One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! 

"100 million concurrent viewers…?!"

Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. 

Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---

altTitles.en: How clumsy you are, Miss Ueno

description.en:
Ueno-san is strong in attitude, but weak in romance.  
It's a clumsy-heroine gag comedy!
description.pt-br: Ueno-san tem uma atitude forte, mas é fraca para romances. É uma comédia com uma garota desajeitada!

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.ja: 世界各国にヒーローがいる中、日本のヒーローは“恥ずかしがり屋”の少女だった!! 彼女を待ち受けるのは…!?
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: 暴君の寝室担当侍女になりました

description.en:
When Lee Chaerin kicks the bucket, she's whisked into a dark fantasy novel as Rose Estania, a chambermaid at the mercy of the tyrant crown prince, Kalix Forsman. Armed with nothing but her real-world hotelier skills and a diary from the real Rose full of cryptic hints but no escape route, she's forced to navigate a dangerous world teeming with Kalix's enemies. Can she keep his wrath in check, evade death, and find her way back to reality before it's too late?

---
Your Highness- That is absurd!!

"Your Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

I'm doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ impoverished novel from the early 2000s! For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Your Highness! Please have mercy!"

"Your Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"

"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"

Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too. Can I survive here and return home?

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

altTitles.ja-ro: Sake to Oni wa Nigou made
Sake to Onna wa Ni-gō made

description.en:
Shida Naori is a college student who loves making alcoholic drinks but has no friends to share them with. At a mixer, she meets Ibuki Hinata, who she ends up taking home with her. After making her a drink, Naori discovers that Hinata is an ogre-girl descended from Shuten-doji who needs alcohol to live, can only drink alcohol offered to her by humans, and grows horns whenever she drinks. Thus, Hinata decides to make Naori her personal bartender.

description.vi: Shida Naori là một cô sinh viên 20 tuổi với một niềm đam mê với cocktail nhưng lại chẳng có ai để uống cùng. Rồi một hôm, cô phát hiện ra rằng cô gái mà cô mang về nhà sau một bữa tiệc lại là một quái nữ, hậu duệ của Shutendoji, và đã quyết định làm bartender riêng của cổ. Những hậu duệ của Shutendoji cần uống rượu như ăn thức ăn, nhưng họ lại bị nguyền rủa là chỉ có thể uống được đồ có cồn mà con người mời.

title.en: I Ran Away and Got Married

description.en:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---

description.en:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
description.ja: 72の魔王が跋扈する混沌とした世界に、72番目の魔王として転生したアシュタロト。そんな彼の前に突如謎の女神が現れ、この世界を改革するようアシュタロトを導く。初めに召喚したメイド兼参謀の魔族・イヴを従え、現実主義者（リアリスト）魔王の伝説がはじまる！
description.pt-br: Em um castelo em ruínas, Astaroth acordou como um Rei Demônio. Com sua "sabedoria de sua vida passada", ele governaria suas terras como um completo "realista".Conheça quem se tornou um senhor que era amado pelo povo e seus subordinados, o homem que seria chamado de o mais poderoso rei demônio da história.

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

description.en: Young Li Haoran tragically died after being ruthlessly betrayed by his teammates in a battle against demonic beasts. However, when he opens his eyes again, he finds himself reborn as the Blood Demon King in a tribe full of succubi. On top of that, he has acquired a special system that allows him to grow stronger simply by building a harem. This time, he will seize the opportunity, forge himself into a true demon, and lead his harem to conquer the world!

description.en:
I was hit by a truck and transported to the world of a novel I had read. Unfortunately, I was possessed by Elenia Alfin, the evil woman from the novel, and the story begins with me sleeping in the same bed as the most loyal holy knight, Sir Rolento, if you know what I mean…

I remembered from the novel, “If a holy knight has a relationship with a woman, he is stripped of his status as a holy knight,” so I decided to try to avoid it and pretend that nothing had happened between the two of us.

Then, Rolento said something shocking: “Please, take responsibility for stealing my virginity.

“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
description.es: Dani y Dorian han perdido el bus a la Escuela de Magia. Ahora, ellos deben encontrar a alguien que les enseñe como ser geniales y buenos hechiceros… o tal vez no.
description.ru: Однажды двое юных волшебников опоздали на Хогвартс-экс… на свой автобус в школу волшебства. Домой вернуться — прибьют, учиться самим — «гори-гори ясно, злостное колдунство» в исполнении местных совершенно немагических жителей. Не учиться совсем — быть Дэни оружием массового поражения, а ее брату Дориану остаться без прав на вождение метлой. Придется искать учителя, чтобы помог набраться ума-разума… или нет. Такого эпично сказочного прогула вы еще не видели!

title.en: Please Get Out of My Household

altTitles.ja: 家門から出ていってください

altTitles.en: Please Get Out of My Family

description.en: “Why did someone like you have to be born in my household?” You shame of the Closieux Family, you disgrace, you good-for-nothing… All those were words pointed at Guinadella Clochel, the young girl who, at barely 11 years of age, was abandoned by her family and had her life taken away. Well, no… Rather, she thought that her life was taken away. “They’re absolute fiends. To think that they would bully and try to kill a weak child just because she has no talent…”, said the ancestor of the legendary great mages of old while possessing the body of the dying girl?! This is a story about a great mage regaining their powers to bring judgment to a rotten family, and a young girl whose emotional wounds are healed with the mage’s help; about a timeless bond that links them as if being drawn to each other. A kind-hearted girl’s revenge against her family begins now!

description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

“You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.”

Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか！乞うご期待！

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
description.ja: マナーやモラルなんて関係ねえ！クズねこの送るヤニまみれでお下品な日常をご覧ください。一応、妹とか普通にかわいいキャラもでてくるから！単行本でしか見れない貴重な喫煙シーンとかたぶん描くんで、予約してくれたらありがてーにゃ(笑)

description.en: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
description.ja: かつて魔王と勇者は対決し、魔王は封印され勇者は力尽きた…。魔王の娘であるヘルは父の仇である勇者への恨みを晴らすべく、彼を蘇らせ、そして下僕としてこき使ってやろうと考えていた。だが、蘇ってきた勇者は何だかやたらとキラキラしていてカッコ良くて、ヘルの調子は狂いっぱなし。果たして勇者を下僕として苦しめることは出来るのか…!?

description.ar:
بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طردت من عائلة آرنو بسبب الترف والفساد . بعد ان تجولت في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش تم اقتيادها إلى دير رث . وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة . الشريرة التي لا تعرف الشرف . كانت هذه بيانكا . هي الحياة قبل عودة " هل هذا حقيقي ؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي ؟ " إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة . هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية ... كل هذا حقيقيا . حقا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى ... ! | سأقوم بأعمال تجارية . الزواج هو أيضا عمل . سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرا جيدا للأعمال التجارية . سيحمي أيضا . لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب الفيكونت اللعين . طفله هذا مهري " للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة . " " كم هو مهر زفافنا ؟ " " 400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة ... كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين . إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك ؟ " وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري .

---
كانت بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طُردت من عائلة أرنو بسبب الترف والفساد.
 بعد أن لم تتجول في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش ، تم اقتيادها إلى دير رثّ.
 وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة.
 الشرير الذي لا يعرف الشرف. كانت هذه هي الحياة قبل عودة بيانكا.

===
 “هل هذا حقيقي؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي؟ ”
 إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة. هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية … كل هذا كان حقيقيًا. حقًا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى …!

 سأقوم بأعمال تجارية. الزواج هو أيضا عمل.

 سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرًا جيدًا للأعمال التجارية. سيحمي طفله مهرتي أيضًا. لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب هذا الفيكونت اللعين.

 “للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة.”

 “كم هو مهر زفافنا؟”

 “400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة … كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين. ”

 “إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك؟”

 وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري.

description.cs:
Bianca de Arno bola bezohľadná grófka v Sevranskom kráľovstve, neslávne známa ako zlá a sebecká manželka. Zatiaľ čo jej manžel, gróf Zachar de Arno, statočne riskoval život na bojisku, ona sedela doma a míňala jeho peniaze. Až v posledný deň si Bianka uvedomila chybu svojich činov. Pred smrťou sa modlí za druhú šancu a prebudí sa vo svojom 19-ročnom tele. Vďaka druhej šanci začne Bianca vidieť všetko v novom svetle... počnúc svojím manželom.

description.en:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

description.es:
Blanca de Blanchefort. Una mujer que era la esposa de Zachary de Arno, pero que fue expulsada de la familia Arno después de su muerte por motivos de lujo, inmoralidad y lascivia. Una mujer que estuvo a punto de ser expulsada a un monasterio en la destartalada frontera tras vagar sin rumbo debido a la caída de su familia paterna, la familia Blanchefort. Y al final, una mujer que finalmente murió en el frío suelo de piedra. Una mujer sin honor. Esa era la vida antes del regreso de Bianca. *** “¿Es esto real? ¿De verdad he vuelto al pasado? “No es un sueño ni una alucinación. Esta hambre, cansancio, viveza… Todo es real.” “Dios me ha dado otra valiosa oportunidad…!” El matrimonio es un negocio después de todo. Tener un hijo de Zachary será una buena fuente de negocios. Mantendré mi dote. El maldito vizconde no se llevará el territorio de Blanchefort y el territorio de Arno. “Debo tener un hijo con mi esposo, Zachary.” “¿No debería valer la pena?” O seducirlo o persuadirlo… Esa es la cuestión.

description.fr:
Quand le Comte d'Arno meurt sur le champ de bataille, il laisse derrière lui sa femme, Bianca d'Arno. Veuve à un si jeune âge et sans héritier, elle est contrainte de vivre dans la pauvreté. Mais un jour, alors qu'elle mourait de faim, elle se réveille dans le passé. Sans aucun doute, Bianca sait ce qu'il lui reste à faire pour survivre: prendre son indépendance financière avant la mort du comte! Mais la tâche s'annonce difficile dans une société où la femme n'a pas son mot à dire...

description.id:
Bianca de Arno, istri Zachary de Arno, adalah istri jahat yang suka berfoya-foya. Setelah suaminya mati, Ia berakhir dibuang dan hidup menderita. Di ambang kematiannya, Bianca kembali ke saat ia berumur 18 tahun. Tapi sama seperti masa lalu, tidak ada seorang pun di county Arno yang menyukai dirinya. Maka itu, Bianca membutuhkan anak yang bisa menjadi penerus yang bisa mengubah posisinya yang dikucilkan. Ia pun bertekad untuk menjalankan tugasnya sebagai istri dan melahirkan penerus count Arno.

---
Bianca de Blanche, FL kita, dibuang oleh keluarga Arno setelah kematian mantan suaminya, Zakari de Arno. Karena keluarganya juga jatuh, akhirnya dia terpaksa tinggal di biara hingga akhir hidupnya. Dan seperti biasa... dia kembali ke masa lalu. Karena Bianca tidak mau mengulang hal yang sama, dia mengajukan pernikahan kontrak dengan mantan suaminya dulu. Dia berpikir, kalau dia punya anak dari Zakari, dia gak akan dibuang lagi oleh keluarga suaminya dan bisa hidup tenang. Apa kehidupan pernikahan kontrak ini akan berjalan mulus seperti yang dia harapkan?

---

description.it:
Bianca de Blanche era la moglie di Zachary de Arno, ma dopo la sua morte fu espulsa dalla famiglia Arno a causa del suo comportamento autoindulgente, frivolo e immorale. Dopo aver vagato inesorabile verso la caduta e la rovina della sua famiglia, la famiglia Blanche, viene portata in uno squallido monastero di periferia. E alla fine... morì sul freddo pavimento di pietra. Una cattiva senza onore: quella era la vita di Bianca prima di tornare indietro nel tempo.

---

贅沢な悪妻、ビアンカ・ド・アルノー。皆に捨てられて死んでいったその時、ビアンカは奇跡的に18歳に回帰する。絶縁状態にある実家、アルノー伯爵領の誰もが私のことを好きではなかった。孤立した私の立場を固めるには跡継ぎが必要… 。「私、貴方の子供を産む準備ができました」「…その話は今度にしよう」「私たちの結婚はおいくらだったでしょうか?値段相応に振舞おうと思うのです。」

description.ko:
비앙카 드 블랑쉐포르.

자카리 드 아르노의 아내였지만 그의 사후, 사치와 배덕함, 그리고 음탕함을 명분으로 아르노가(家)에서 내쳐진 여자. 친가인 블랑쉐포르가(家)의 몰락으로 오갈 데 없이 방황한 끝에 초라한 변방의 수도원으로 쫓겨나다시피 한 여자. 그리고 그 끝에 결국 차가운 돌바닥 위에서 죽게 된 여자.

명예를 모르는 악녀.

그것이 바로 비앙카의 회귀 전 생이었다.

===

“이게 현실이라고? 정말, 과거로 돌아온 거란 말이야?”

꿈도, 환각도 아니다. 이 배고픔은, 피로는, 생생함은….
이 모든 것은 현실이었다.

정말, 정말 그렇다면. 신이 나에게 다시 한 번의 값진 기회를 주신 거라면…!

‘나는 장사를 하는 거야. 결혼도 결국 장사니까. 자카리의 아이는 좋은 장사 밑천이 되어 줄 거야. 내 지참금도 지켜 주겠지. 블랑쉐포르 영지도, 아르노 영지도 그 빌어먹을 자작에게 빼앗기지 않게 될 거야.’

그러려면 그녀의 남편, 자카리의 아이를 낳아야 한다.

“우리의 결혼은 얼마짜리 결혼이었죠?”
“송아지 400마리, 돼지 900마리, 은그릇 100개, 비단 300필, 보석 두 궤짝, 그리고 영지 일부분…. 아르노가의 이 년 치 예산 만큼이었지.”
“그 값은 해야 하지 않겠어요?”

그를 유혹해서든, 설득해서든.

Бьянка де Бланшфор. Жена Захари де Арно, изгнанная из семьи мужа после его гибели. Ей больше некуда было идти, семья Бланшфор разорилась и была отправлена в монастырь на границе королевства. Женщина, в итоге встретившая свой конец на холодном каменном полу.  Злодейка без чести: такой была жизнь Бьянки до того, как она вернулась в прошлое.

前生的碧安卡身为阿尔诺伯爵的夫人，把结婚当做了一场生意的她成为了挥霍无度的恶妻，而在丈夫去世之后，身败名裂的她被家族抛弃，最终凄惨而终。一睁眼她重生回到18岁，这一世她决定要好好把握机会，为了逃避惨死的命运，她要做一个懂事的妻子，还要努力怀上阿尔诺家族的继承人…

description.pt-br:
Bianca de Blanche era a esposa de Zachary de Arno, mas após sua morte, ela foi expulsa da família Arno por luxo e imoralidade.

Depois de vagar sem propósito após a queda de seu pai e da família Blanche, ela é levada para um monastério de periferia.

E no final, ela acabou morrendo no chão de pedra fria.

Uma vilã que não conhece a honra. Essa era sua vida antes do retorno de Bianca.

===

“Isto é real? Eu voltei ao passado?”

Não é um sonho ou uma alucinação. Essa fome, fadiga, vivacidade… Tudo isso era real. Realmente, se sim, se Deus me desse mais uma oportunidade preciosa…!

‘Vou fazer negócios. O casamento também é um negócio.’

O filho de Zachary será uma boa fonte de negócios. O filho dele também protegerá meu dote. Nem a fortaleza Blanche, nem a província de Arno serão levadas por aquele maldito visconde.

‘Para fazer isso, tenho que dar à luz o filho de Zachary, meu marido da minha vida anterior.’

“Quanto é o nosso dote de casamento?”

“400 bezerros, 900 porcos, 100 tigelas de prata, 300 sedas, dois baús de joias e uma parte da propriedade… Isso era tanto quanto o orçamento de dois anos da família Arno. “

“Então, eu não deveria ter que pagar por isso?”

Quer eu o tente ou o convença, tenho que ficar com Zachary.

---

description.zh-hk:
奢侈的惡妻，微安卡·德·阿爾諾。在被所有人拋棄並死去的時候，微安卡奇蹟般地回到了18歲。

在宛若絕緣狀態的婆家-阿爾諾伯爵領地裡誰都不喜歡自己。

要鞏固孤立的地位，就需要接班人… “我已經做好給你生孩子的準備了。”

“…那件事以後再說吧。” “我們結婚需要多少錢？我願意出那個價。”

altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.vi: Kuroto Nakano là một nhân viên văn phòng trẻ tuổi có cuộc sống vô cùng bận rộn và căng thẳng, gần như dành toàn bộ thời gian trong ngày ở công ti. Một đêm nọ, sau ngày dài làm việc quá sức, anh mở cửa nhà và thấy một cô gái với tai và đuôi cáo đang nấu cơm trong bếp. Tên cô là Senko, một hồ li 800 tuổi. Senko đã từ thế giới tâm linh hạ phàm để giúp Nakano xua tan căng thẳng và tìm lại hạnh phúc.
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

description.en:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.
description.ko:
"나를 과거로 보내주시오."

이 시대에서 그를 죽일 수 없다면, 과거로 돌아가면 되리라. 시간을 거스를 수 있는 '회귀대법(回歸大法)'으로 그토록 원하던 과거로 회귀한 한 남자. 

가족도, 친구도, 삶도, 모두 잃었던 '검무극(劍無極)'의 복수를 위한 첫걸음이 시작된다.

description.en:
In the year 1520, the reclusive island of 'Kodornacht' suddenly falls into a deep winter, one whose intensity is enough to freeze the very sea it resides in, opening its shores to the outside World for the first time in over a millennia.

With untold riches up for the taking, it gives birth to a gigantic treasure hunt.
However, Kodornacht hides something much more important and mysterious: The Phantom Court—a trinket with the power to control winds, fortune, and, some say, even resurrect the dead. 

The Hunt begins.
___________________
My third manga project, Phantom Court is a story containing fantasy elements that hopes to bring to the readers enjoyable characters and high-stakes conflicts.

I've been working on this one for a while; I hope you'll join me for the ride.

More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr

The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
description.ja:
隅々まで探索されつくした世界に、唯一残された秘境の大穴『アビス』。どこまで続くとも知れない深く巨大なその縦穴には、奇妙奇怪な生物たちが生息し、今の人類では作りえない貴重な遺物が眠っている。
「アビス」の不可思議に満ちた姿は人々を魅了し、冒険へと駆り立てた。そうして幾度も大穴に挑戦する冒険者たちは、次第に『探窟家』呼ばれるようになっていった。

アビスの縁に築かれた街『オース』に暮らす孤児のリコは、いつか母のような偉大な探窟家になり、アビスの謎を解き明かすことを夢見ていた。そんなある日、リコはアビスを探窟中に、少年の姿をしたロボットを拾い…？
description.ka: უზარმაზარი გამოქვაბულების სისტემა, რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც უფსკრული, არის ბოლო შეუსწავლელი ადგილი მსოფლიოში. არავინ იცის, რამდენად ღრმად მიდის ეს ტიტანური ორმო, დასახლებული უცნაური და გასაოცარი არსებებით და სავსე იდუმალი უძველესი რელიქვიებით, რომელთა დანიშნულება თანამედროვე ადამიანისთვის უცნობია. თამამი ავანტიურისტთა თაობები მიზიდული იქნა უფსკრულის იდუმალი სიღრმეებით. დროთა განმავლობაში მათ, ვინც საკმარისად გაბედულები გამოიკვლიეს სახიფათო ორმო, გახდნენ ცნობილი როგორც "დელვერები". ორთში, უფსკრულის პირას მდებარე ქალაქში, ცხოვრობს პატარა ობოლი, სახელად რიკო, რომელიც ოცნებობს გახდეს ისეთივე დიდი დელვერი, როგორც დედამისი იყო და ამოხსნას ორმოს დიდი საიდუმლო. ერთ დღეს, ბუნდოვანი სიღრმეების შესწავლისას, ის წააწყდება პატარა ბიჭს, რომელიც აღმოჩნდება, რომ რობოტია…
description.ru: Огромная пещерная система, известная как Бездна, является последним неисследованным местом в мире. В этой титанической яме обитают странные и удивительные существа. Она полна таинственных древних реликвий, предназначение которых неизвестно современному человеку. Поколения смелых авантюристов были затянуты загадочными глубинами Бездны. Со временем достаточно храбрые, чтобы исследовать опасную яму, стали известны как «Исследователи Бездны». В Оосу, городе на краю Бездны, живет маленькая сирота по имени Рико, которая мечтает стать великим пещерным налетчиком, каким была ее мать, и разгадать великую тайну ямы. Однажды, исследуя темные глубины, она натыкается на маленького мальчика, который оказывается роботом...
description.es-la: El enorme sistema de cuevas, conocido como El Abismo, es el último lugar inexplorado en el mundo. Nadie sabe que tan profundo es este agujero titánico, habitado por extrañas y maravillosas criaturas y lleno de misterio y reliquias antiguas de propósito desconocido para la humanidad. Generaciones de valientes aventureros han sido atraídos a las profundidades cripticas del Abismo. Con el paso del tiempo estos exploradores son conocidos como "Exploradores de las Profundidades". En Oath, el pueblo al borde del Abismo, vive una pequeña niña huérfana llamada Riko, que sueña con convertirse en una gran exploradora como su madre y descubrir los misterios del Abismo. Un día explorando las obscuras profundidades se encuentra con un niño, que resulta ser un robot...

description.en:
“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!
description.pt-br: "Quem sou eu?" A lenda da Legião Estrangeira Francesa, 'Kang Chan'! Durante a guerra Africana, ele era chamado de 'Rei do Blackfield', o deus da terra negra, o qual os seus inimigos tinham temor e medo. Porém, durante uma missão para matar Masallan, o cérebro por trás do SISS, o grupo de defensores sunitas, Kang Chan foi morto em combate por um tiro vindo de trás dele. Enquanto sua visão embaçava, ele viu os treze membros de seu batalhão, que tinham absoluta fé nele, sendo mortos um após o outro. Enquanto Kang Chan aguardava a morte depois de ter sido atingido por um traidor, ele foi salvo por um poder misterioso e acordou 3 anos depois na Coréia do Sul. Contudo, ele estava no corpo de outro 'Kang Chan', um garoto de 19 anos no ensino médio que era ameaçado na escola. A jornada de Kang Chan para conseguir se vingar do traidor e descobrir a verdade por trás do seu renascimento começa agora!

title.en: An Extra Stole the Male Leads

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)
description.ru:
Коллаб между автором тайтла Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун! и Warewareda

Тойфер Сяорон - вечный мечтатель, поступив в демоническую школу Бабирус, стремится вступить в состав Студенческого Совета, не ища легких путей, решив доказать свою полезность тем самым вынудив президента студ.совета Амели самой прийти вербовать его, но что то пошло не так... Хитростью заманенный в батор по захвату и контролю школы Сяорон пытается выжить и не умереть на безжалостных заданиях!

description.en: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe

This series is adapted from a novel on the zhulang site. 

Lin Qinghan’s grandfather (her father’s father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of “Satan” among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.

title.en: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero

description.en:
Twenty years.

For twenty long years, the thirteenth saint Lee Geon was trapped inside the Tower of Demons after being backstabbed by twelve of his allies. These twelve "saints" were warriors chosen by the twelve Zodiac gods to defeat mysterious monsters called "calamities" that were massacring the planet. Though no god had chosen Geon as a saint, he became the mightiest of them all, which made him a hero... and a target.

But now, Geon has brawled his way out of the tower, and he's back stronger than ever. All that's left is to exact brutal payback on each of the saints, but none of these powerful beings will go down without a fight.

Will Geon be able to stay in one piece while achieving the divine revenge of his dreams?

---

- [Tapas English Translation](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-disaster-class-hero/info)
description.fr:
Il était une fois un héros qui considéré autre fois comme le plus puissant de la Terre.

« Mais il est mort… Comment une personne désignée comme morte pourrait-il revenir ? »
« Ouais, j’aimerais bien voir ça, moi aussi. »

Mais 20 années plus tard, il revint.

« Pourquoi êtes-vous aussi choqués, les gars ? À voir vos gueules, on pourrait croire que vous vous sentez coupable ? »

‘Ces enfoirés… je vais pas les laisser s’en tirer comme ça…’
description.ko:
지상에 최강의 영웅이 있었다.

“하지만 죽었잖아. 우리가 죽인 놈이 어떻게 돌아와?”
“그러게. 돌아올 수 있으면 한번 돌아와 보라지.”

그런데 20년 만에 진짜 돌아와 버렸다?

“뭘 그리 놀래? 왜. 양심에 찔릴 짓이라도 하셨나?”

이 XX들. 가만 안 둔다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)
description.pt-br:
Eu era o maior herói da Terra.

“Mas ele está morto. Como aquele cara que matamos está de volta?”

“Não sei.”

Eu realmente voltei depois de 20 anos?

“Por que estão tão surpresos? Fizeram algo para ficar com a consciência pesada?”

Seus desgraçados. Vocês não perdem por esperar.

title.en: I Cultivate Both God and Demon Dominating the World

description.en: In the era of myriad races, different species fight against each other to seize more resources, even going so far as to wage wars. Amidst the bloody battles and endless scheming, as the ancient human race fades into the river of history, a new human race rises through bloodshed, fighting for survival...
description.zh: 万族时代，为争夺更多资源，不同种族之间互相争斗，甚至不惜掀起大战。在血雨腥风和尔虞我诈的时代里，随着古人族消失在历史长河中，新的人族踏着鲜血崛起，为了生存而战......

description.fr: Dans ce monde, il y a des gens qui attirent naturellement les autres. Jun Kang, qui cache la douleur d'un amour unilatéral derrière une image d'étudiant modèle, commence à s'intéresser à Go Yohan lorsqu'ils deviennent camarades de classe en deuxième année. Que se serait-il passé s'il était tombé amoureux de Go Yohan ? « Jun-ah, à quoi ressemble le premier amour ? »

altTitles.ja: ～異伝・絵本草子～ 半妖の夜叉姫

description.en:
Can the three teenage daughters of demon dog half-brothers Inuyasha and Sesshomaru 
save their parents, themselves, and both realms from the menace of the seven mystical Rainbow Pearls?

Living in the present day isn’t easy for Sesshomaru’s daughter Towa. 
She can’t remember where she came from, must conceal her mysterious powers, 
and is either worshiped or feared by girls she just wants to be friends with. 
But she has no way of returning to her own time until the day 
a demon attacks and she is transported to feudal-era Japan.

There Towa, her twin sister Setsuma, and her cousin Moroha —Inuyasha’s daughter—
have a mission bestowed upon them by the mystical Tree of Ages. 
With only vague memories of their past to guide them, the three young women set out to find their parents, 
heal a rift in time, and fulfill their royal destiny...

Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.
description.ko: 엄마를 위해 헌터가 되려 했던 주인공 지형. 그러나 일진들이 엄마를 식물인간으로 만든다. 복수하려 했지만, 철저히 부서지고 갇히는데… 모든 걸 잃은 소년은 마수가 되어 사냥을 시작한다.

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

altTitles.en: The Late Game Healer Is Way Too Strong

description.en:
South Korea’s top hunter, 'Mad Dog' Min Si-woo.

The moment he and his disciples defeated the Demon King! He was sent to another world, and after 100 years of battling in a monster-infested realm, he finally returned to Earth!

"But why has everyone forgotten about me?"

100 years in the other world was only 10 years on Earth. Now, a seasoned veteran hardened by a century of bloodshed, Min Si-woo sets out to find his lost disciples and uncover the reason behind his erasure!
description.ko:
대한민국 최상위 헌터, '광견' 민시우.

제자들과 마왕을 처치한 순간! 이계로 보내지고, 마물이 가득한 이계에서 100년 동안의 싸움 끝에 드디어 지구로 돌아왔다!

'그런데, 왜 내 존재가 사람들에게 잊힌 거지?'

이계에서의 100년은 지구에서의 10년이었고, 100년의 혈투로 '고인물'이 되어 돌아온 민시우는흩어진 제자들과 본인의 존재가 잊힌 이유를 찾아 나선다!

title.en: The Vampire Dies in No Time

altTitles.ja: The Vampire dies in no time.

description.en:
Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to… everything. He dies, disintegrating into a pile of sand, at the slightest shock.

After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc's castle destroyed, Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires, Ronaldo's terrifying editor, Draluc's eccentric family, and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vampire-dies-in-no-time)

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.fr:
Un sabre ne doit servir qu'à punir le mal et à protéger les faibles... Aspirant forgeron, Chihiro travaille chaque jour aux côtés de son père. De nature taciturne, il est tout l'opposé de son paternel, un homme qui a toujours le mot pour rire. Ils avaient tout pour vivre heureux... jusqu'à cette terrible tragédie.

Désormais, leur belle relation est tachée de sang, et leur bonheur est à jamais perdu. Consumé par la haine, Chihiro est aujourd'hui animé par une détermination sans faille...
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Meikyuu Kingdom: Damu Tokushu Butai SAS no Ossan no Isekai Dungeon Survival Manual

altTitles.ja: 迷宮キングダム　特殊部隊SASのおっさんの異世界ダンジョンサバイバルマニュアル！

altTitles.en: Meikyuu: Labyrinth Kingdom, a Tactical Fantasy World Survival Guide

description.en: After being transported to another world, one man's mission is to rebuild a kingdom. He has a very particular set of skills and he's ready to face any obstacle because...who dares, wins! Monster, dungeon, and war stand no chance against the special forces!

Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3166015)

description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata’s world off its axis...
description.ja: 世田谷の豪邸に住む紫雲寺家の７人兄弟姉妹は、才色兼備で巷でもその名を轟かせている。長男の新は、個性の強い５人の姉妹に振り回されながらも家族を大切にして過ごしてきた。しかし、末の妹の誕生日会で父親から驚きの事実を告げられ、兄弟姉妹の運命は一変する―!?
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?
